content:
Yes, some tours and attractions in Dublin offer discounts for students. Here are some examples:

1. Kilmainham Gaol Museum Tour - Students can receive a discount on admission with a valid student ID. 2. Dublin Castle State Apartments Tour – Students can receive a discount on admission with a valid student ID. 3. Trinity College Book of Kells Tour - Students can receive a discount on admission with a valid student ID. 4. Glasnevin Cemetery Museum Tour - Students can receive a discount on admission with a valid student ID. 5. Many hop-on-hop-off bus tours in Dublin offer student discounts on tickets. It's always a good idea to check the website or contact the tour operator directly to confirm if they offer student discounts and what the requirements are for obtaining the discount.
